snippet: Italian industrial conglomerate Finmeccanica will sign a contract with ATR and Lion Air on Thursday in the presence of Prime Minister Matteo Renzi, his office said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Finmeccanica to Sign Contract With ATR, Lion Air-Italy Government
headline.main: Finmeccanica to Sign Contract With ATR, Lion Air-Italy Government

lead_paragraph: Italian industrial conglomerate Finmeccanica will sign a contract with ATR and Lion Air on Thursday in the presence of Prime Minister Matteo Renzi, his office said on Wednesday.
